---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 

ROTW by 6.

F0F0 -> C3C3

00101
R5 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index X - XXX

LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index X - XXX

LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index X - XXX

LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index X - XXX

LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index X - XXX

LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index X - XXX

LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index X - XXX

LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index X - XXX


00001 - RS1
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.
 
LI R5 with 1111000011110000 at index 0 - 000
LI R5 with 1111000011110000 at index 1 - 001
LI R5 with 1111000011110000 at index 2 - 010
LI R5 with 1111000011110000 at index 3 - 011
LI R5 with 1111000011110000 at index 4 - 100
LI R5 with 1111000011110000 at index 5 - 101
LI R5 with 1111000011110000 at index 6 - 110
LI R5 with 1111000011110000 at index 7 - 111
 

00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode

1100001101001010000100000 


program
0000000000000000011000101 
0001000000000000011000101 
0010000000000000011000101 
0011000000000000011000101 
0100000000000000011000101 
0101000000000000011000101 
0110000000000000011000101 
0111000000000000011000101 
0000111100001111000000001  
0001111100001111000000001  
0010111100001111000000001  
0011111100001111000000001  
0100111100001111000000001  
0101111100001111000000001  
0110111100001111000000001  
0111111100001111000000001

passes.
